title: 'Friendship': lo-contrast italic w/ swashy script cap / Any chance of a quick "ballpark" font ID
content:
looks custom but i need to match semi close for some comps.Any help would be super appreciated!

author: seedoor

comments.content: I think it might be [Sassoon Primary Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111318/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/sassoon_primary_by_linotype_com_complete_vp/) squooshed a bit.
